ComicInfo.Title: Sensationalized Reference Books; Typical Graduates; Television Commercials You Never Get to See; At the Art Gallery; New Designs for Business Cards; If Madison Ave. Advertised the Twist; Awards for Unsung Students; Have You Ever Noticed How Walking Advertisements Never Match the Man?; Navy-Rated Wife; How Different T.V. Cowboys Get Their Man; Custom Made Towels; Inside Teenage Russia; Who Will Replace Jack Paar?; The Beach Balloon; Dear John Letters of History; The Numbers Game
ComicInfo.Summary: A man blows into a beach balloon to inflate it but blows so hard that he deflates himself.
